title: Family Secrets
description: In this Dateline classic, a father and his sons have a dream to build an extreme sports theme park. But reality hits when the dad is found dead on the floor of their Skim-X warehouse. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on September 16, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
